title: World - Demo
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
When all is said and done
And the air we breathe is not enough
To keep these broken wings floating
Carry on into the sun, into the sun
[Interlude 1]
On into the sun
On into the sun
[Pre-Chorus 1]
Looking down at you, sleeping
From above, I love
Looking down at you, weeping
From above, my love
[Chorus]
Over and over again, I ride the wheel that turns
Over and over again, I find the soul that burns
And if it has no end, the lonely heart that learns
Over and over again, I ride the wheel that turns
[Verse 2]
When all is dead and gone
And the air we breathe is not enough
To keep these dying arms, see them
Carry on into the sun, into the sun

[Interlude 2]
I'm not the only one
I'm not the only one
[Pre-Chorus 2]
Heaven skies are reelin'
And my hand that holds the world
Deep inside I'm reachin'
Into the universe
[Chorus]
Over and over again, I ride the wheel that turns
Over and over again, I find the soul that burns
And if it has no end, the lonely heart that learns
Over and over again, I ride the wheel that turns
[Bridge]
Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh-oh
Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh!
[Guitar Solo]
[Chorus]
Over and over again, I ride the wheel that turns
Over and over again, I find the soul that burns
And if it has no end, the lonely heart that learns
Over and over again, I ride the wheel that turns

[Bridge]
Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh-oh
Oh! Oh! Oh!
[Outro]
Over and over again, I ride the wheel that turns
Over and over again, I find the soul that burns
